lines.text: My name is Chance and I'm lost in the city with an optimistic dog and a sarcastic kitty.
It's a thing of beauty when Chance is on duty!
Speaking of doody, I thought I smelled something
This is the city. Only the strong survive.
Oh, then you're a goner.
Does the cat always have to be the brains of the operation? Beauty and brains. I never cease to amaze myself.
Theres only one thing I know that could make this moment happier. In fact, I think I smell it coming up the driveway right now. Can it be? Yes, yes I think it is. It's pizza!
Ninty-nine cans of dog food on the wall, ninty-nine cans of dog food, EVERYBODY

[all join in]
If one of those cans should happen to fall, ninety-eight cans of dog food on the wall.
Cats only!
I hate this song!

[singing]
I lost my heart in San Francisco.
Hurry, Chance! You don't want to miss dinner!
[Chance ignores her]
It's amazing! I mention food, and he doesn't even move!
Sassy, do you hear a truck?
No, Shadow. I see a truck!

Jamie? Is that you? Wait, what am I talking about? Of course, it's you! It's really you! I found you! I found my boy! I found my Jamie! Oh, I'm so happy! Oh, I could just lick you for days! Give me a hug!
Hi
Don't you hi me. First, you chase me, then you try to kill me, then you kiss me? What's the game?
Game? I don't have a game. Look, I was only chasing you because your friends back in the alley asked me to, okay?
My friends, huh? So tell me, what are my friends' names?
Shadow and Sassy.
Huh! Lucky guess. Okay, show me the secret paw shake.
Secret paw shake? They didn't show me any secret paw shake.
Aha! They didn't, huh? Good, because there ain't one. Now explain that kiss.
Kiss? That was no kiss. Friendly lick, maybe.
Friendly? Boy, is that an understatement.
Okay, let's try this again. I'm Delilah, Chance.
Delilah Chance? Wow, your last name is the same as my first name!
Boy, good thing you're cute.
Well, this is it. Home sweet home. Hey, it's nothing fancy, but the price is right, and nobody bothers us, so you guys can stay as long as you like.
Thanks, Riley. You're very kind.
Right, if he's so kind, why doesn't he help us find that bridge?
We can't leave until we find Chance.
Why not?
You know you miss him.
Okay, I miss his stupid jokes, and his stupid face, and his stupid... stupidness.
Oh, Sassy, stop it.
And I'm stupidly starting to worry about him.
I've never really felt this way before.
Me neither. I wanted to say the same thing to you all day, but then I thought you'd laugh at me and then you'd think I'm a dork.
[Delilah laughs]
Geez, you are laughing at me!
No, I'm laughing with you.
I knew that.
I'd always heard love hurts. I never knew it could hurt this much. It's like getting a bath and missing dinner and going to the vet all rolled up into one.

[going down a slide]
Chance slides, and he's out of there!

[following him down the slide]
Chance, you're gonna kiiiiiiiilll me!

[following them down the slide]
Can someone tell me why I keep following Dumb and Dumber?
I wasn't scared. I wasn't scared one wee little...
[pees]
... bit.
Obviously.

[to a poodle]
Nice fuzz, cuz! What, did you get in a fight with a lawn mower?
[last lines]

[eating pizza]
Boy what a day, you know, I couldn't think of a happier ending.
They treat us pretty good here. Three meals a day and all the smelly sneakers you can eat.
Nothing smells worse than wet dogs.
I welcome danger with open paws.
And a constantly open mouth
Hello Stinky, long time no smell.
What's got eight legs, no brains, spins around and screams like a baby?
I don't know, what?

[rolls tunnel over]
You guys.

[after being dazed by Chance]
I'm going to hurt you.

[running backwards on a conveyer belt]
Wow, this is cool. An obstacle course!
[Sassy is in ametal tube that Chance has just rolled down the hill]
Who got me on this ride?
Dogs rule and cats drool.
I'm going to hurt you.
I'm Sparky Michaels.
I'm Lucky Lasorda.
And I'm Trixie Uecker.
